title: Welcome to Conduit
html:
Welcome to conduit!


In this brief guide you will learn about the impressive features included in conduit.
Conduit consists of different posts, posted by me ( martia_f ). You can click on any post you like, or scroll further for more posts.
Clicking on a post, shows a BEAUTIFUL ( oops, my bad ) animation, and you will see the interactive content that i have posted, an example is this one. If you scroll a bit more in every page, you can find out that by swiping from left to right, you can get back to the main menu.
Each interactive component has its own guide on how to use it, so... i think i am done here, see ya!

title: Keep your own pet in your phone via conduit!
html:
Here is your virtual pet!


The virtual pet grows in realtime, and even remembers exactly how much food it wants, and how clean it is. Taking care of your pet is relatively easy, you just need to visit it every 2-4 days!

title: Minecraft axolotls and how cute are they
html:
My thoughts on minecraft and axolotls


Well, to begin with, axolotls are the cutest beings in existence, and minecraft just added them in the 1.17 update!
At first, i thought well, this is just a mob like all the others, but i was WRONG.
when i saw them, I WAS AMAZED by how good their design and SFX were.
It was like heaven!
I immediately started collecting them, and i even made a small cave-like habitat for them to live in/spawn!
Well, let's say i really love them now!

title: Jailbreak alternatives, fake or real?
html:
Jailbreak alternatives. Fake or Real?


If you search for "jailbreak alternatives", you will be rewarded with thousands of websites that try to milk you and make you pay for something that you can easily find for free on the internet.
With all of this in mind, it is still your choice to decide wether to pay for them or not.
